metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28211 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A heap overflow in LzmaUefiDecompressGetInfo function in EDK II.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28211` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 2020.11-4
ovmf-ia32 - 2020.11-4
qemu-efi - 2020.11-4
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2020.11-4
qemu-efi-arm - 2020.11-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2020.11-4').
